Package: org.ar4k

[Groovy] Class IstanzaConsul

    • org.ar4k.IstanzaConsul

    • IstanzaConsul

      Rappresenta un'istanza consul su un vaso

      Authors:
      Andrea Ambrosini (Rossonet s.c.a r.l)
      Version:
      0.1-alpha
      See Also:
      Meme
      Ricettario
      Interfaccia
      Contesto

          https - The HTTPS API, -1 to disable. Default -1 (disabled).

          rpc - The RPC endpoint. Default 8400.

          serf_wan - The Serf WAN port. Default 8302.

          server - Server RPC address. Default 8300.
